content: LOT 1: 3x 2016 Satori 1k bits chips#025210: https://mempool.space/address/13xANRSK4YHBDSpHrvzetjns8k5BmX7De6#025211: https://mempool.space/address/1Le8eFAUFVxJ3yDYPb3EpSTZuHn6G5zb3q#025213: https://mempool.space/address/18bFuvGg6THRSLar44Az95o37XdQ64qTu2LOT 2: 3x 2018 Moonbits 1k bits chips#T2576: https://mempool.space/address/17gapqiJfe1b1sjsCGk9MFKRbh2aDsdq8j#T2579: https://mempool.space/address/1BwbRK6UTcmmAaNUc46u7jeu697ixymH1T#T2580: https://mempool.space/address/1JGEmpN4cTqa6bPRaLMKhjfsfTTuj9EsqcLOT 3: 2x 2019 Sol Noctis Binary Bull 1mbtc, silver 1ozhttps://mempool.space/address/1E2jiVEmRr4ZWod2wq7AmEeEpUZb6EVgoxhttps://mempool.space/address/1A7bJTyZgKRHofzztwDN4mNUv9aNdNNKc6**All 3 lots will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 3rd, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT:BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
